attributes.action: Ban parking outside of schools during 8am/9am,3pm/4pm reduce the risk
attributes.additional_details: More and more people are either impeded or have issues with parking outside of schools we call on the government to ban parking outside of schools during pick up and drop off times and make clear drop off and pick up points that gaurantee the safety of children travelling to school
attributes.background: Parking outside of school gates should be banned for numerous reasons. It's an issue all over the uk, congestion risk to children walking to and from school and also blocking residents from parking or getting out of drives, emergency service impeded at times also

rejection.details: You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
